item.title: Paper: Characterising the IETF Through the Lens of RFC Deployment
item.description:
Abstract

Protocol standards, defined by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF), are crucial to the successful operation of the Internet. This paper presents a large-scale empirical study of IETF activities, with a focus on understanding collaborative activities, and how these underpin the publication of standards documents (RFCs). Using a unique â€¦

item.title: Impact of early engagement on longevity of IETF participation
item.description: Higher engagement with the community in the early years influences longevity of association with IETF
item.dc:creator: Prashant Khare
